<!-- @generated by usage-cli from usage spec -->
# `morphir dist update`

- **Usage**: `morphir dist update [-v --version <VERSION>] <NAME>`

Update an installed Morphir distribution

## Arguments

### `<NAME>`

Name of the distribution to update

## Flags

### `-v --version <VERSION>`

Version to update to (defaults to latest)
